content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 1, Arsenal 4.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 1, Arsenal 4.
Foul by Erik Pieters (Stoke City).
Theo Walcott (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Saido Berahino.
Peter Crouch (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Peter Crouch (Stoke City).
Attempt blocked. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Glenn Whelan.
Attempt saved. Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Substitution, Arsenal. Theo Walcott replaces Olivier Giroud.
Substitution, Arsenal. Danny Welbeck replaces Mesut Özil.
Substitution, Stoke City. Ramadan Sobhi replaces Marko Arnautovic because of an injury.
Goal!  Stoke City 1, Arsenal 4. Olivier Giroud (Arsenal) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Aaron Ramsey.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) because of an injury.
